about_the_game:
An All-Female Fighting Extravaganza!

Step into the electrifying world of Vanguard Princess, a fast-paced 2D fighting game featuring an all-female cast of powerful and mystically gifted warriors. When a devastating cosmic shockwave grants young girls extraordinary abilities, chaos erupts as a vengeful figure rises to obliterate humanity. The fate of the world now rests in the hands of a brave group of heroines, each driven by personal motives and dreams.

Key Features:

  • Diverse Cast of Characters
    Choose from 10 unique girls, each with their own fighting styles, special abilities, and personality. Customize your playstyle by pairing your fighter with a powerful assist character to form an unstoppable team.

  • Engaging Storyline
    Follow the gripping narrative in Story Mode, uncovering the secrets behind the cosmic shockwave and the rise of the vengeful antagonist.

  • Intense Gameplay
    Master fast-paced, skill-driven combat mechanics designed for both newcomers and experienced fighting game enthusiasts.

    • Game Modes for Every Player

      • Story Mode: Experience the adventures of the Vanguard Princesses as they face their destinies.

      • Versus Mode: Challenge friends or AI opponents in head-to-head battles.

      • Tutorial Mode: Learn the basics of combat and master the unique moves and combos of each character with step-by-step guidance.

      • Training Mode: Hone your skills, practice combos, and perfect your strategies in a customizable, pressure-free environment.

  • Beautiful Art and Design
    Immerse yourself in the vibrant anime-inspired visuals and fluid animations that bring every character and move to life.

  • Controller Support
    Fully compatible with your favorite game controller for a seamless fighting experience.

Are You Ready to Fight?

Join the battle to save—or destroy—the world. Choose your heroine, embrace your mystical powers, and become a legend in Vanguard Princess!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains fanservice-oriented character designs, with revealing outfits and exaggerated body proportions.
Certain attack animations emphasize suggestive elements, including jiggle physics and exposed clothing.

name: Vanguard Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, XP, 2000
  • Processor: Pentium III 400MHz, 128MB RAM
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, XP, 2000
  • Processor: Pentium III 400MHz, 128MB RAM
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Vanguard Princess is a 2D fighting game featuring an all-female cast, each with unique fighting styles. Choose from 10 girls, pair with a powerful partner, and form an unstoppable team. Play through Story Mode, battle in Versus Mode.
